/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves forming a natural canopy overhead. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades adding a splash of color to the scene. Cars of different makes and models are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the bustling city life. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky and the varied hues of the buildings and cars.
